entities.name: Griffon
entities.diet: Carnivore (preys on small mammals and livestock)
entities.description: A majestic creature with the head and wings of an eagle and the body of a lion. Griffons are known for their intelligence, loyalty, and fierce fighting spirit.
special_abilities: Sharp talons and beak for powerful attacks

entities.name: Nightshade Flower
entities.description: A beautiful but highly poisonous flower with bell-shaped purple blooms. All parts of the Nightshade Flower are toxic and can be fatal if ingested.
